name: The Wizard's Tower
description: The Wizard's Tower is a Tower Defence game that gives you direct control over the Towers. Using three different elements to maximum effect to stop your foes from destroying your main Tower.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 325 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
